name: Luke Mason - 1999 DEMO
description:
A child's dream finally came true. Luke Mason who wanted to be a detective his whole is finally able to enter the profession. He hopes his first case is going to be easy.

 He couldn't be more wrong.

This game is about man who finally starts his job as a detective. He gets his first case hoping that he could get an easy start to the profession. Sadly he has to realise that this company isn't an ordinary company.

Your goal in this short version is to go in to the basement.

This demo contains only one ending.

This game contains:

 VHS like graphics. Papers that add more to the story. And more.

CONTROLS

WASD                    Movement                  E Interact Shift Run CTRLCrouch

Please note that this is only a DEMO. Many more things are going to be added in the full version. This DEMO is nowhere near compared to what it's going to  be like when this game is finished.

 It's going to be short.  This short version was only made to attract people to my game. The full version of this game will be for sale.

If you find a bug or just want to provide feedback I encourage you to comment.

Donations are very much appreciated as it helps me stay motivated.

Thank you for reading! :D
